title: PLZ HELP WITH LAG
body:
Hello summoners.
Recently since the servers had maintanence ive been getting lag only when i die, it causes a dc and i have to wait 2 mins b4 rejoining and even then i lag. i also have found out that a certificate security thing from riot is making my net go all wonky, is there a way to fix this?

replies.body:
>Hello summoners.

lol

>ive been getting lag only when i die

Is this frame-lag or ping-lag? How would you be able to tell the response time if you don't have your champion alive to move?

>i also have found out that a certificate security thing from riot is making my net go all wonky

That's more related to your internet options, not Riot's game specifically. Have you checked over them recently to make sure someone or something hasn't changed them on you?

What OS and ISP are you with?
